Package ui.game

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Game
    Represents the game area in the context of the UI.
    A selectable grid of sections built upon a SectionGrid.
    GameBoard
    Represents the game board.
    A selectable grid of sections built upon a SectionGrid.
    GameBoard.PromotionIndicator
    Represents a piece's ability to promote from the last row in the game.
    Represents a drawable selectable buffered section.
    Represents a selectable section that can be drawn to the terminal window.
    Represents a section that can be drawn to the terminal window.
    Hand
    Represents a player's hand.
    A selectable grid of sections built upon a SectionGrid.
    MinimumSize<T extends SelectableResponsiveSection>
    Ensures that the terminal window is big enough to display the game by replacing whats on screen with a message if it's too small.
    A selectable minimum size section.
    Shows a different section if smaller than a certain size.
    A responsive section with a stored number of rows and columns.
    Represents a section that can be drawn to the terminal window.
    MinimumSize.MinimumSizeDialog
    A dialog to show when the terminal window is too small.
    A selectable minimum size section.
    Shows a different section if smaller than a certain size.
    A responsive section with a stored number of rows and columns.
    Represents a section that can be drawn to the terminal window.
    MinimumSize.MinimumSizeDialog.Dialog
    The actual too small dialog.
    Represents a bordered box with a section in the top and a row of buttons at the bottom.
    Represents a selectable section that can be drawn to the terminal window.
    Represents a section that can be drawn to the terminal window.
    MinimumSize.MinimumSizeDialog.TooSmallMessage
    The message shown inside the too small dialog, as well as on its own if the window is too small for the dialog.
    An unselectable responsive section.
    Allows an unselectable section to be used like a selectable one.
    MinimumSize.MinimumSizeDialog.TooSmallMessage.Handler
    A movement key handler that does nothing except handle escape.
    A key handler that translates key presses into movement directions.
